name: chargeless
content:
chargeless adjective
(PAYMENT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
US with nothing, or no extra charge (= amount of money), to be paid; free: A maximum of one chargeless sample pack will be sent to each address. They offer chargeless shipment for orders over $49. The bills are chargeless to buy on our website and there are no fees if you accumulate them to maturity.

Costing little or no money
chargeless adjective
(ELECTRICITY)
with no electrical charge (= positive or negative electricity): The subatomic particle called a neutrino is chargeless. A hydrogen atom with a muon instead of an electron, like a proper atom, appears chargeless from the outside.
